original_text: yet your father has cheated me and changed my wages ten times. But God did not permit him to harm me.
korean_text: 그대들의 아버지가 나를 속여 품삯을 열 번이나 변경하였느니라 그러나 하나님이 그를 막으사 나를 해치지 못하게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: yet your father has cheated me
and changed my wages ten times
But God did not permit him to harm me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님은 그가 나를 해치도록 허락하지 않으셨습니다
